name: SPAPE
description:
SPAPE crashed on a lonely planet. Help him find the scattered spacecraft pieces         around the planet.

                      

Controls

A   D - Left Stick  ->  Move

Spacebar - South Button  ->  Jump / Double Jump

LShift - West Button -> Dash

Installation

1. Unzip file

2. Open .exe file

3. Play

Credits

Music and  SFX - Epidemic Sound and Replica Studios

Big thanks to the teachers from the htk academy.

Made with Aseprite and Unity
